message: Hello Bob, I have a unique product that I think you might be interested in. Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. I can do $120, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $120?
